title: Farm Pressure
description: Daily peak blade utilisation and errored job counts from Tractor farm snapshots (gold_farm_pressure_daily).

panels.title: Peak Active Blades
panels.description: Maximum number of active render blades observed across all farm snapshots each day.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, peak_active_blades AS "Peak Active Blades" FROM gold_farm_pressure_daily ORDER BY event_date

panels.title: Peak Errored Jobs
panels.description: Maximum errored Tractor jobs in a single snapshot per day.  Sustained non-zero values indicate systemic farm problems.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, peak_errored_jobs AS "Peak Errored Jobs" FROM gold_farm_pressure_daily ORDER BY event_date
